channel.title: [REQ] Autosave Script for Testscape [REQ]
channel.description:
Hi, i know noone actually gets any help in this forum because a lot of the people that know anything dont even come here. But what the hell. Its worth a try.
My problem is I cannot find an autosaving script for testscape. I know it has one when members log out but im looking for one that saves every few seconds. I have searched the forums and tried searching now but im getting a database error. Help would be appreciated.
Thanks. :)[br][size=1]Posted at: August 21, 2006, 07:29:27 AM[/size][hr]bump@g3
